definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The focal point of the article lies in the survey of showing resources inside Shandong University.
sentences.chinese: 文章的重点在于对山东大学内部展示资源的调查。

sentences.english: Folk literature of Shandong University has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 山东大学的民间文学专业有着悠久的历史。

sentences.english: He graduated from Shandong University and Shanghai University , now works at CBN.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于山东大学和上海大学，现就职于第一财经日报。

sentences.english: The research of folk literature in Shandong University has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 山东大学的民间文学研究有着悠久的历史。

sentences.english: James Menzies and His Collection of Chinese Art. Shandong University Press, 2000;
sentences.chinese: 明义士和他的藏品，山东大学出版社。

sentences.english: I shall accept the arrangements of Shandong University at Weihai regarding my studies.
sentences.chinese: 接受山东大学威海分校对学习的安排。

Da4 lian2 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2

definition: Suzhou or Soochow University (Suzhou, PRC since 1986)
